body: In the hands of a dwarf, this +1 warhammer functions as a +2 returning warhammer. It can be hurled with a 20-foot range increment. When hurled, a dwarfbond hammer deals an extra 1d8 points of damage against creatures of the giant subtype.
name: Dwarfbond hammer
